Guest Services

Click here for Security information at Palm Beach Outlets.

At Palm Beach Outlets, we offer an array of amenities and services to provide you with the best shopping experience possible.

Customer Service Sponsored by Good Samaritan Medical Center

Customer Service is located in the Food Court. Customer Service provides customers with store information, directions to the mall, information regarding upcoming promotions and other requested services.

Directions, Maps and Information

Contact Customer Service at 561.515.4400 for directions and/or maps. Tri-Rail and Bus Schedules are all available at Customer Service for customer convenience.

Valet Sponsored by

Valet Located near Forever 21

Employment Opportunities

A list of employment opportunities is available at Customer Service. In addition, job listings are posted on www.palmbeachoutlets.com.

Lost and Found

Any lost and found items are logged in at Customer Service locate in the Food Court. To contact Lost and Found, please call 561.515.4400.

Package Assistance and Escorts

For your convenience, we offer package assistance and escorts. See Customer Service in the Food Court or call 561.515.4400.

Public Restrooms

Public restrooms are located in the Food Court and by Saks Fifth Avenue OFF 5TH.

Strollers

Strollers can be rented for mall use only through an automated stroller set-up located near Saks Fifth Avenue OFF 5th and Tilly's.

Bike Racks

For customer convenience, bike racks are located by GAP Factory Store, Rackroom Shoes, Nike Factory Store and Tommy Hilfiger Company Store.

Taxi Service

Please see Customer Service to request taxi service.

Wheelchair Rentals

Complimentary wheel chairs courtesy of

24 Hour Security

Security assistance is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for customers and employees. Call the security phone line at 561.515.4400.

Electric Vehicle Charging Stations

Electric Vehicle Charging Stations are located near the Tommy Hilfiger Company Store and Nike Factory Store.
For charging station locations, visit www.chargepoint.com.
